channel.title: How to start a scar script on startup?
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I have a scar script and when I open it the scar program pops up with the scar code inside, then I only have to press run and it starts. How could I make it that when the computer starts up that the scar script starts without anyone having to click on run or anything..?
Thank you, Youri Dudock.
EDIT : No1? O.o

item.title: How to start a scar script on startup?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:4, topic:422296”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=524967.msg3839296#msg3839296 date=1323123297]
Simba is the new SCAR.
[/quote]

What’s the difference between the two?[/quote]

Simba is newer, more advanced. I recommend u look at MITB for this type of stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: How to start a scar script on startup?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Lol I searched ‘moparscape scar’ on google and this came up as the 2nd result. (I’m trying to learn more about SCAR as I can make money from making scripts (I started yesterday :3). RSBot isn’t coming back any time soon)

Anyway I guess you would put it in the startup folder or something.

Read full topic
